description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31753.name: {BShift in the Tracks{x

description: As you gaze through the window in the door
you spy astounding sights as huge machines
march up and down the factory floor while
small men work on them.
You have arrived at the back entrance to the MagiTek
Factory. A sort of redish cast iron door is all
that stands inbetween you and the factory. The door has
a small viewing portal. As you gaze into the interior you
are amazing by the machinery inside, and are fearful
of what this place is producing.
31606.name: {BEntryway to the MagiTek Factory{x

description: You hang cautiously onto the iron constructs
raised above the city streets. As you look down
you realize a drop would be fatal, therefore you
cannot even think of jumping. The rafters you are on
are old and rusty, and make horrid noises when you move
upon them. It is prudent to tread lightly.
31603.name: {BRafters above Vectorian Streets{x

description: The room here is covered in soot and steel shavings.
This room is used to create replacement parts for the MagiTek Armors.
The MagiTek Armors walking around in this room as made poorly and need fixing badly.
31620.name: {BParts Production Line{x

description: This room is bare and empty except for the creatures who
walk about in it. You wonder why they would post anyone here
to guard nothing, then you notice two very large creatures
and understand that they are guarding them, you know they
must be very special.
31691.name: {BEmpty Room{x

description: The room here is covered in soot and steel shavings.
This room is used to create replacement parts for the MagiTek Armors.
The MagiTek Armors walking around in this room as made poorly and need fixing badly.
31623.name: {BParts Production Line{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31721.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: The air here is quiet stale, and the room seems quite sterile. This is the
Security Quadrant, the checkpoint of the factory, from here on
the forces inside the factory are more closely guarded. The MagiTek
Armors that move around here are better than the previous ones that you
encountered, however, they are still far from the top of the line.
You start to sense that the security here is really more for show than for
effect.
31638.name: {BSecurity Quadrant{x

description: You stand in a narrow corridor. Unlike the rest of the
factory this is narrow and clean. You sense that this
corridor leads to where the factory is managed, and it's
real power source. You have passed most of the production zones.
31671.name: {BCorridor{x

description: You are standing on a large flat platform. The platform is made
up of pale pink tiles. The height is dizzying as you make
your way to the edge of the precipice. The platform is square and
immaculatly clean, unlike the rest of the factory. You sense that
there is something odd about it.
31636.name: {BPlatform{x

description: This room is bare and empty except for the creatures who
walk about in it. You wonder why they would post anyone here
to guard nothing, then you notice two very large creatures
and understand that they are guarding them, you know they
must be very special.
31688.name: {BEmpty Room{x

description: You stand in the entry hall to the MagiTek Factory.
This is where the light work is done. Workers clean the walls
here and scrub the floors, but they also are working on MagiTek Armor.
The weakest workers and units in the factory reside here.
31614.name: {BEntry Hall{x

description: You stand in the heart of the factory. Around you stand machines that
are driving the assembly floor. The people who walk these floors are
highly authorized and do not much like your prescence. The ceiling is
high here. The walls and floor are green, and wires hang out of the
walls.
31697.name: {BCommand Center{x

description: You hang cautiously onto the iron constructs
raised above the city streets. As you look down
you realize a drop would be fatal, therefore you
cannot even think of jumping. The rafters you are on
are old and rusty, and make horrid noises when you move
upon them. It is prudent to tread lightly.
31602.name: {BRafters above Vectorian Streets{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31720.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31766.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You hang cautiously onto the iron constructs
raised above the city streets. As you look down
you realize a drop would be fatal, therefore you
cannot even think of jumping. The rafters you are on
are old and rusty, and make horrid noises when you move
upon them. It is prudent to tread lightly.
31605.name: {BRafters above Vectorian Streets{x

description: You stand in a tunnel leading to an unknown destination.
The tunnel is dark grey, and the floor is a pale pink.
People walk this corridor, but do not go down the shaft at
the end of the tunnel for some unknown reason.
31710.name: {BBack Tunnel{x

description: You stand in a storage room, many devices for controlling
the factory rest here. Many are broken and defunct, but
some are still working and the Pipsqueaks are using them.
It is darker in this room and you worry about someone
sneaking up behind you.
31677.name: {BStorage{x

description: You stand in a narrow corridor. Unlike the rest of the
factory this is narrow and clean. You sense that this
corridor leads to where the factory is managed, and it's
real power source. You have passed most of the production zones.
31672.name: {BCorridor{x

description: You stand in the entry hall to the MagiTek Factory.
This is where the light work is done. Workers clean the walls
here and scrub the floors, but they also are working on MagiTek Armor.
The weakest workers and units in the factory reside here.
31612.name: {BEntry Hall{x

description: The floor here is covered in metal shavings and soot, and
you can hardly see the pale pink floor. Loud noises come from
all around you as MagiTek Armors are being produced at an astounding
rate. Sparks fly through the air and burn your skin. Large windows
let in light to the main floor so the workers can see what they
are doing. An aura of mystery permeates the air here.
31656.name: {BMain Assembly Floor{x

description: You stand in a storage room, many devices for controlling
the factory rest here. Many are broken and defunct, but
some are still working and the Pipsqueaks are using them.
It is darker in this room and you worry about someone
sneaking up behind you.
31678.name: {BStorage{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31723.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand in a large tunnel of sorts, machines transport
materials back and forth here. This is where supplies
are shipped from the parts production line to the main
assembly floor. Pipsqueaks polish the parts here, while
MagiTek Armors guard the supplies.
31644.name: {BTransportation Hallway{x

description: Directly north is the Entryway of the Magitek Factory.  To the
south is the rest of the compound.  To the east a large rail comes in
from above.  Welcome to the Magitek Factory.  The smell is great.
31770.name: {MR{moad {MT{mo {MT{mhe {MM{magiTek {MF{mactory{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31713.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand in a very odd room. Large holding tanks are placed
throughout the room. They are filled with green liquid and
what looks like people. As you look closer you realize the people
are Espers, which are being drained of their energy and
turned into Magicite.
31705.name: {BSecret Magicite Storage{x

description: You stand in a large tunnel of sorts, machines transport
materials back and forth here. This is where supplies
are shipped from the parts production line to the main
assembly floor. Pipsqueaks polish the parts here, while
MagiTek Armors guard the supplies.
31642.name: {BTransportation Hallway{x

description: The air here is quiet stale, and the room seems quite sterile. This is the
Security Quadrant, the checkpoint of the factory, from here on
the forces inside the factory are more closely guarded. The MagiTek
Armors that move around here are better than the previous ones that you
encountered, however, they are still far from the top of the line.
You start to sense that the security here is really more for show than for
effect.
31632.name: {BSecurity Quadrant{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31733.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31728.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand in the employee breakroom. You are stunned at
how horrid the conditions are. It seems odd to you that
the employees are overwhelmingly happy with the conditions,
because they used to never get breaks at all. Dust covers
the floor and seriously needs sweeping. You feel a need
to sneaze while here, and should leave soon.
31627.name: {BEmployee Breakroom{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.

constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.

31729.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

31621.name: {BParts Production Line{x

the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31750.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You see before you the mighty MagiTek Factory, however, you cannot
get in the front way as it is blocked by many guards.  You see a path
through that involves going up on rafters above the city streets.  The
dank smell of burning charcol eminates from the foul factory, and you
wonder if it is a god idea to go in.
31600.name: Entrance to the MagiTek Factor

description: You stand in a narrow corridor. Unlike the rest of the
factory this is narrow and clean. You sense that this
corridor leads to where the factory is managed, and it's
real power source. You have passed most of the production zones.

31640.name: {BSecurity Quadrant{x

description: You stand atop a huge steel bridge. The bridge is formed
by planks of solid steel and the chain holding it up is
steel wire. The surface is smooth and sturdy. There are steel
rails on the side to hold. The drop from this point would be fatal as
you cannot even see the bottom of the chasm.
31667.name: {BSteel Bridge{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31739.name: {BEnd of the Line{x

description: You stand in a large tunnel of sorts, machines transport
materials back and forth here. This is where supplies
are shipped from the parts production line to the main
assembly floor. Pipsqueaks polish the parts here, while
MagiTek Armors guard the supplies.
31643.name: {BTransportation Hallway{x

description: You hang cautiously onto the iron constructs
raised above the city streets. As you look down
you realize a drop would be fatal, therefore you
cannot even think of jumping. The rafters you are on
are old and rusty, and make horrid noises when you move
upon them. It is prudent to tread lightly.
31601.name: {BRafters above Vectorian Streets{x

description: The floor here is covered in metal shavings and soot, and
you can hardly see the pale pink floor. Loud noises come from
all around you as MagiTek Armors are being produced at an astounding
rate. Sparks fly through the air and burn your skin. Large windows
let in light to the main floor so the workers can see what they
are doing. An aura of mystery permeates the air here.
31651.name: {BMain Assembly Floor{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31732.name: {BTurn in the Tracks{x

description: You stand in the heart of the factory. Around you stand machines that
are driving the assembly floor. The people who walk these floors are
highly authorized and do not much like your prescence. The ceiling is
high here. The walls and floor are green, and wires hang out of the
walls.
31692.name: {BCommand Center{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31748.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand in a very odd room. Large holding tanks are placed
throughout the room. They are filled with green liquid and
what looks like people. As you look closer you realize the people
are Espers, which are being drained of their energy and
turned into Magicite.
31701.name: {BSecret Magicite Storage{x

description: You stand in the entry hall to the MagiTek Factory.
This is where the light work is done. Workers clean the walls
here and scrub the floors, but they also are working on MagiTek Armor.
The weakest workers and units in the factory reside here.
31610.name: {BEntry Hall{x

description: The floor here is covered in metal shavings and soot, and
you can hardly see the pale pink floor. Loud noises come from
all around you as MagiTek Armors are being produced at an astounding
rate. Sparks fly through the air and burn your skin. Large windows
let in light to the main floor so the workers can see what they
are doing. An aura of mystery permeates the air here.
31661.name: {BMain Assembly Floor{x

description: You hang cautiously onto the iron constructs
raised above the city streets. As you look down
you realize a drop would be fatal, therefore you
cannot even think of jumping. The rafters you are on
are old and rusty, and make horrid noises when you move
upon them. It is prudent to tread lightly.
31604.name: {BRafters above Vectorian Streets{x

description: The air here is quiet stale, and the room seems quite sterile. This is the
Security Quadrant, the checkpoint of the factory, from here on
the forces inside the factory are more closely guarded. The MagiTek
Armors that move around here are better than the previous ones that you
encountered, however, they are still far from the top of the line.
You start to sense that the security here is really more for show than for
effect.
31630.name: {BSecurity Quadrant{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.

the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31716.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: You stand atop a huge steel bridge. The bridge is formed
by planks of solid steel and the chain holding it up is
steel wire. The surface is smooth and sturdy. There are steel
rails on the side to hold. The drop from this point would be fatal as
you cannot even see the bottom of the chasm.
31635.name: {BSteel Bridge{x

description: The air here is quiet stale, and the room seems quite sterile. This is the
Security Quadrant, the checkpoint of the factory, from here on
the forces inside the factory are more closely guarded. The MagiTek
Armors that move around here are better than the previous ones that you
encountered, however, they are still far from the top of the line.
You start to sense that the security here is really more for show than for
effect.

are doing. An aura of mystery permeates the air here.
31647.name: {BMain Assembly Floor{x

31633.name: {BSecurity Quadrant{x

description: You stand on the rail tracks which run an uncountable distance.
The rail is a sleak new iron track. The wood crossboard holding
the rail together is not even warped or splintered yet.
The wall in the tunnel is slightly dusty from when it was
constructed. You hear all sorts of bizzare noises here.
31722.name: {BOn the Rail Tracks{x

description: The floor here is covered in metal shavings and soot, and
you can hardly see the pale pink floor. Loud noises come from
all around you as MagiTek Armors are being produced at an astounding
rate. Sparks fly through the air and burn your skin. Large windows
let in light to the main floor so the workers can see what they
are doing. An aura of mystery permeates the air here.
31664.name: {BMain Assembly Floor{x

description: The room here is covered in soot and steel shavings.
This room is used to create replacement parts for the MagiTek Armors.
The MagiTek Armors walking around in this room as made poorly and need fixing badly.
31617.name: {BParts Production Line{x

description: You are standing on a large flat platform. The platform is made
up of pale pink tiles. The height is dizzying as you make
your way to the edge of the precipice. The platform is square and
immaculatly clean, unlike the rest of the factory. You sense that
there is something odd about it.
31670.name: {BPlatform{x

description: You stand in the employee breakroom. You are stunned at
how horrid the conditions are. It seems odd to you that
the employees are overwhelmingly happy with the conditions,
because they used to never get breaks at all. Dust covers
the floor and seriously needs sweeping. You feel a need
to sneaze while here, and should leave soon.
31625.name: {BEmployee Breakroom{x

description: You stand in a very odd room. Large holding tanks are placed
throughout the room. They are filled with green liquid and
what looks like people. As you look closer you realize the people
are Espers, which are being drained of their energy and
turned into Magicite.
31706.name: {BSecret Magicite Storage{x

description: You stand in a storage room, many devices for controlling
the factory rest here. Many are broken and defunct, but
some are still working and the Pipsqueaks are using them.
It is darker in this room and you worry about someone
sneaking up behind you.
31676.name: {BStorage{x

description: This room is bare and empty except for the creatures who
walk about in it. You wonder why they would post anyone here
to guard nothing, then you notice two very large creatures
and understand that they are guarding them, you know they
must be very special.
31686.name: {BEmpty Room{x

description: The floor here is covered in metal shavings and soot, and
you can hardly see the pale pink floor. Loud noises come from
all around you as MagiTek Armors are being produced at an astounding
rate. Sparks fly through the air and burn your skin. Large windows
let in light to the main floor so the workers can see what they
are doing. An aura of mystery permeates the air here.

description: You stand in a tunnel leading to an unknown destination.
The tunnel is dark grey, and the floor is a pale pink.
People walk this corridor, but do not go down the shaft at
the end of the tunnel for some unknown reason.

31761.name: {BTurn in the tracks{x

description: You stand in a narrow corridor. Unlike the rest of the
factory this is narrow and clean. You sense that this
corridor leads to where the factory is managed, and it's
real power source. You have passed most of the production zones.
31673.name: {BCorridor{x

description:
You see a pipsqueak before you.
This little creature works as a mechanic
for the MagiTek Armors. While pipsqueaks are not as 
strong as a MagiTek Armor unit, they are still formidable.
31616.room_name: A smart pipsqueak is here, tuning up the machines.
31616.name: a smart pipsqueak~

This little creature works as a mechanic
for the MagiTek Armors. While pipsqueaks are not as 
strong as a MagiTek Armor unit, they are still formidable.
31618.room_name: A burly pipsqueak is here, tuning up the machines.
31618.name: a burly pipsqueak~

description:
You see a terrifying machine. It is
essentially a weapons platform with a wheel.
The wheel allows it to move back and forth
across the rail to whereever it is needed.
31619.room_name: A MadRoader is here, riding on the rail.
31619.name: a madroader~

description:
You see a monsterous mechanical beast.
This huge contraption blocks the tracks.
This is a roving death machine, designed
to destroy any enemy of the empire.
It is set to kill anything that walks
by, fortunatly a glitch in it's programming
has disabled that function however, and
the machine will fight only if attacked.
31620.room_name: A track runner is here, blocking the rail.
31620.name: track runner~

description:
You see before you a strong and fearsome guardian.
The guardian is made entirely out of fire,
and poses a substantial threat.
31600.name: a guardian of flame~

31601.d_flags: D Falls to the floor and says, "I have given my all, I die with honor!"~
description:
You see before you a strong and fearsome guardian.
The guardian is made entirely out of ice, and
poses a substantial threat.
31601.name: a guardian of frost~

description:
You see before you a strong and fearsome guardian.
The guardian is made entirely out of electric energy, and
poses a substantial threat.
31602.name: a shock guardian~

description:
You see a vision of light and healing. Shiva the esper
is known for her healing powers, yet she looks
to be in great despair. You get a horrid feeling that
she is here trapped, against her will.
31603.room_name: Shiva hovers above the ground here, sheding light upon the room.
31603.name: Shiva~

description:
You see Ifrit, the Esper of Fire.
You fear this warrior, and his reputation.
You feel intense heat from his body
as you near him, you wonder if it
would be a good time to back off.
31604.room_name: Ifrit stands here, sheading sparks of flame.
31604.name: Ifrit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
This piece of MagiTek armor has seen
much use and is old and worn.
31605.room_name: A soldier is riding in old and rusty MagiTek Armor here.
31605.name: a rusted magitek unit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
This piece of armor is shoddy as it
was made poorly in the factory
and sent to serve as a light guard.
31606.room_name: A soldier is riding in shoddy MagiTek armor here.
31606.name: a shoddy magitek unit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
This piece of MagiTek armor is weak.
Though still formidable, it is not in
top condition.
31607.room_name: A soldier is riding in weak Magitek Armor here.
31607.name: a weak magitek unit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
This piece of MagiTek armor is average
in everyway, and is the main force of
the empire's control.
31608.room_name: A soldier is riding in MagiTek Armor here.
31608.name: a magitek unit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
This piece of armor was well made
and is used in tense situations where
the empire needs to exert maximum
force.
31609.room_name: A soldier is riding in strong MagiTek Armor here.
31609.name: a strong magitek unit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
This unit is piloted by a very
experienced command and is deadly in
all aspects. This unit should be
attacked only with caution.
31610.room_name: An experienced soldier is riding in MagiTek Armor here.
31610.name: an experienced magitek unit~

description:
You see a soldier of the empire of Vector
mounted atop MagiTek armor, the soldier's
uniform is brown and tan and his
helmet is rounded. The MagiTek armor
is essentially a cockpit with legs.
You see before you the best of the best
This unit one of the very few, and
safeguards the most important items that
the empire holds to it's own. Take
care or you shall end up dead.
31611.room_name: A crack soldier is riding in MagiTek Armor here.
31611.name: a crack magitek unit~

description:
You see a pipsqueak before you.
This little creature works as a mechanic
for the MagiTek Armors. While pipsqueaks are not as 
strong as a MagiTek Armor unit, they are still formidable.
31612.room_name: An old pipsqueak is here, tuning up the machines.
31612.name: an old pipsqueak~
